sentences: Tegelikult pistas ta oma nina teiste asjade alla.
Kui sa pistad käsi tule külge, siis sa põled!
context: In Estonian, 'pista' is the basic form of the verb meaning to insert, push, or put something into something else. It's commonly used when talking about putting objects into containers, slots, or spaces. The verb follows regular conjugation patterns and can be used in various tenses depending on context.
